channel.title: faq on Particl Project Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in faq on Particl Project Wiki

item.title: FAQ: PART coin
item.description: What is PART? Can I store PART on a hardware wallet? Where can I buy PART coins? Will PART be added to other exchanges? What is PART’s codebase? What are the transactions fees for PART? What are PART’s transactions sizes? What is PART’s inflation rate? Why has PART different privacy states? Are whitepapers available for the CT and RingCT privacy protocols? Is Segwit enabled?

item.title: FAQ: Particl Open Marketplace
item.description: Are there fees for using the marketplace? Who collects the fees? Do I need to keep my computer online for my listings to stay up? How long do listings stay up? Can I use any other coin other than PART? Are regular (fiat) currencies and traditional means of payment accepted? How much privacy does the marketplace offer? Is the marketplace moderated? How does the escrow system functions?
